data.title: Police rush to reports of 'ritual mass murder,' but it was just a yoga class
data.description: When a yoga teacher turned out the lights toward the end of one of her classes in Britain this week, her hope was to encourage peaceful relaxation.

data.title: From BMW to Porsche: Take a look at the cars on display at one of the world's biggest auto shows
data.description: The BMW Vision Neue Klasse, Mercedes-Benz Concept CLA Class, Lucid Air Midnight Dream Edition and even a Lamborghini made of Lego pieces were on display at IAA Mobility.

data.title: Wall Street analyst sees 3 companies as the next $3 trillion stocks due to AI. Here's our take
data.description: Amazon, Microsoft and Alphabet are advancing their generative AI capabilities, which should tremendously accelerate their future growth.

data.title: Google will soon require disclosures for AI-generated election ads
data.description: Google created new disclosure rules for election advertisers that use AI in their messages or visuals.

data.description: Delhi High Court Refuses To Restrain Use Of PolicyBazaar Trade Marks On Google AdWords Program

data.title: Roku stock jumps after company says it will lay off 10% of workforce
data.description: Roku Inc. said in a regulatory filing Wednesday, it will be laying off 10% of its workforce, or 360 people, as it raised its guidance for its third-quarter.

data.title: The generative AI boom should have been Appen's time to shine. Here's what went wrong
data.description: Appen helped train artificial intelligence models for Google, Microsoft and Amazon, but the company now faces deteriorating financials and executive departures

data.title: EU lists Alphabet, Amazon, Meta and three other tech giants as 'gatekeepers' under strict competition rules
data.description: The European Union on Tuesday unveiled a list of six designated "gatekeepers" set to come under its new Digital Markets Act.
